content: * please note that this listing is for the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern on my blog www theturtletrunk com * the picot headband features lots of fun texture and a knot like front this pattern includes instructions for 8 sizes ranging from newborn to adult large these are perfect for mommy & me sets as gifts or just for you and the family this pattern works up so quick and easy difficulty easy standard us crochet terms 8 sizes baby 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months child 1-3 years & 3-10 years adult teen/adult small medium large supplies medium 4 weight yarn 5 50mm i hook yarn needle & scissors patten also includes -gauge pattern -link to free video tutorial -special stitches instructions & photos -written instructions for all 8 sizes
